name: Witch
text: lol I own u now bitch.

name: Witch
text: I made your head a pumpkin so you don't try to run away.

name: Witch
text: Isn't that great? You smile all the time.

name: Witch
text: Bring me ingredients for my potions or I'll kidnap your family too.

name: Witch
text: Talk to me to learn what I need next.

name: Witch
text: Oh and be nice to my familiar, Fluffcat.
